content:
Jananee parishuddha-praarththhanayaal naathhaa!
Punyam nyangallkkum-vigatharkkum nalka.

Parishuddha shleehaa-nibi sahadenmaare!
Yaachippin krpaye nyangallkkaayu ningall

Nin sharane mrtharaam-thaathasahodararil
Choriyaname moda-ppanineeren naathhaa!

Susmrthi jananikkum-vishruthi siddharkkum
Jeevan vigatharkkum cherppone! Sthothram

Jananee parishuddha praarththhanayaal naathhaa!
Punyam nyangallkkum-vigatharkkum nalka.
